---
title: "cache.invalidate"
description: "Invalidates an instance."
---

```lua
cache.invalidate(i: Instance): void
```
Removes `i` from the roblox instnace cache. Effectively removing the `i` as a reference to the Instance.

## Example

```lua
local Lighting = game:GetService("Lighting")
cache.invalidate(game:GetService("Lighting"))

print(Lighting, Lighting == game:GetService("Lighting")) -- outputs: Lighting, false
```
